Package model

Class CalendarManager

java.lang.Object
model.CalendarManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICalendarManager
public class CalendarManager extends Object implements ICalendarManager
Manages a collection of calendars and tracks the currently active one.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CalendarManager()
    Creates a new calendar manager with an empty set of calendars.

      public boolean addCalendar(ICalendarContext calendar)
      Adds a new calendar to the manager.
      Specified by:
      addCalendar in interface ICalendarManager
      Parameters:
      calendar - The calendar context to add
      Returns:

      Returns:
